column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////I'm sure we'll be back
column2: I'll probably try the spicy chicken ramen
column3: as it looked and was told by my friend it was really good. No real issues from beginning to end and they can do split checks. This newcomer definitely has an upper hand on not only the ramen
column4: but ambiance when compared to all the other ramen places in town so far. Glad they opened this second location in town!
